message.content:
cs.AI, cs.HC, cs.LG, cs.CL, cs.CY 

Reasoning: The paper discusses the use of artificial agents in teaching and the formalization of their teleportation, which falls under the category of artificial intelligence (cs.AI). The focus on interaction with human students suggests a connection to human-computer interaction (cs.HC). The use of an overseeing AI system and the need for verification suggest a connection to machine learning (cs.LG) and computational linguistics (cs.CL). Finally, the use of artificial agents in education may also fall under the category of cybernetics (cs.CY).
